name: Enshroud
description:
You are someone from the paranormal world sent to an old hospital to purify a ghost. Your job is to clear any ghosty traces and clear the ghost presence so that the normal people won't be aware of any paranormal activity.

Game made for the Spooktober Gamejam.

Theme : Mask the truth

Credits :

Maxime Groseiller : 3D assets

Florentin Trichet : Concept & code

All sounds come from the pack "Gamemaster Audio - Pro Sound collection"

We had a lot of fun on this project and hope you will enjoy it.
